name: Breakable - Marble Madness
description:
This is the first game I have created (almost) entirely by myself (some assets and code are external).

Thanks to this work I learned the importance of prefabs (at my expense).

In this little project, I had the opportunity to get busy with programming in C#, the management of different components of Unity and with all the aspects that in general concern the creation of a game within the engine.

As for the design, I concentrated on the structuring of versatile mechanics (the breaking of elements by chromatic correspondence), which could generate different dynamics with simplicity and elegance.

Also, I tried to structure a progression that followed the Super Mario rule.

This project allowed me to win the "best level design" award at the Digital Bros Game Academy.
